Name: Diesel generator - Capacity: 100 to <350 kVA - Equipment that is either hard anchored or is vibration isolated with seismic snubbers/restraints - Combined anchorage/isolator & equipment fragility

GeneralInformation.Description: Costing is per unit and is based upon 250 kVa.
GeneralInformation.Author: Not Given
GeneralInformation.Notes: User to provide median demand and dispersion values.  The values listed are default PACT values and do not represent the response of this component.

DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Repair anchorage and concrete pad and remount equipment.

DamageStates.Description: Anchorage failure & Equipment damaged beyond repair.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Replace equipment including attached utilities in addition to repairing anchorage and concrete pad.

DamageStates.Description: Damaged, Inoperative but anchorage is OK
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Repair fracture pipes & damaged nozzles, and or reconnect exhaust line.

DamageStates.Description: Equipment is damaged and inoperative but anchorage is OK.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Overhaul because of drive shaft misalignment.

DamageStates.Description: Equipment is damaged and inoperative but anchorage is OK.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: minor electrical repair e.g., replace relays.
